14.content:
As you get over the doors sealing behind you, you turn around and are surprised with what you see. Though you've gone 'inside' and the whole area is enclosed with a ceiling full of lights that at the moment are off, it's almost like you're still in the wilderness. There's grass under your feet that is up to your waist, and there seems to be giant grass mound houses a ways off. Shaking your head at the strangeness of it all, you make your way towards the houses, hoping for some kind of help. As you get closer to the houses, you realize that they are either absolutely huge compared to you, or you are insanely small compared to them.

The latter is confirmed as you get to the first house and walk through the entrance hole and you see furniture that must be made for a giant. In fact, upon looking around, you see that this house is actually only one room, and you stare in awe at a giant figure sleeping in an equally giant bed. The rest of the room is more than slightly rustic, but you notice that though everything looks to have no technology, you notice there is a small fridge and even a TV that are disguised with twigs and grass to meld into their surroundings. If everything around you was 'normal' size, you figure you'd only be a few inches tall! Still reeling from this realization, you almost miss the form starting to move in it's sleep.

You hear a loud but girly moan and you realize that this must be a giantess. You think you must be going absolutely mental, but that feeling only gets worse as your eyes adjust and you see the woman roll away from you and push the cover off of her body... with her tail. Your jaw drops as you see but don't believe that this 'woman' is not only giant, but she's also a Naga! Your eyes sweep from her head to the tip of her tail. The girl is naked, her brown hair is long and tangled though not too unkempt, sure to give her slight modesty up front. But no amount of hair would adequately cover this Nagas absolutely massive butt, and it is massive to the extreme, even for someone her size. Yanking your eyes away from her deep, wobbling crack, you see that just under her butt the tail forms. It's over double the length of the rest of her body, covered in seemingly sharp scales. You shiver as you notice that her tail ends in a large rattle, not boding well for your safety.

But you're getting tired, and you're not going to get any help unless you get someone, or something, to notice you, and you've never even believed in Nagas before this point, so it's not like you know how she'd react to you...
14.title: Not So Mythical... And Huge

142.content:
You sigh as you make your decision. You never thought in a million years that something like this would ever happen, but what other choice did you have? At least this 'woman' was stationary, who knew what would happen if you tried to get her attention while she was on the move. Not knowing when the lights high above will turn on to signal morning, you start off at a good pace. You try your best not to stare, but your eyes have a will of their own as she continues to shuffle slightly in her sleep, darting back and forth from her rattle that shakes slightly now and again and her giant ass that is wobbling almost nonstop.

Suddenly you lose your footing and almost fall face first as the ground underneath you shakes in tremors. You turn around to see what's causing them, just in time to see another humongous figure enter the doorway. You're relieved to see that the figure doesn't have a tail, and you slowly sweep your eyes up from her boot clad feet. Your sight climbs from her boots up her overly-olive skinned legs, which quickly grow into a pair of very chubby thighs that disappear under a very short fur sash that is appears to be barely holding in her even more massive hips. This leads up to a fairly tubby belly, followed by a big pair of breasts with nipples barely covered by a strip of fur cloth. You're relieved to find that there's another human here, even if her skin looks kind of funny, but that relief only lasts for a second as your eyes travel from her expansive cleavage up her neck to her face.

Your jaw drops as the 'woman' smiles at the sleeping figure behind you, flashing a large pair of fangs and a forked tongue that licks her top lip absentmindedly. This only keeps your attention for a moment or two however as you see her hair... moving. You didn't think your eyes could get any wider, but they do as you realize that this woman is a Medusa!!! You stare at the snakes that constantly tangle in and out of each other with minds of their own, and you brace to be turned to stone as her snake-like eyes sweep over the floor and you. After a few moments you are slightly comforted by the fact that apparently the stories of Medusas turning you to stone at a glance are false, but only slightly.

"Honey, it'sss time to get up. You want to be presssentable for breakfassst." She gets no response from the Naga woman behind you, but you glance over at the sleeping beauty just in time for...

PPPHHHRRRAAAPPPTTTT!!! You're disgusted as a raunchy fart rips out of the Naga's butt, her ass cheeks slapping together continuously as the nauseous gas escapes her.

It's almost like a car crash, you don't want to look, but you can't look away as the Medusa just chuckles. "Hsshsshss... Raya, Honey, what have you been eating? Hsshsshss." The smell spreads into the room and gets to your nose, and you immediately feel like throwing up. You're so distracted by the horrible smell that you don't notice the tremors of the Medusa walking up behind you until out of nowhere her foot slams into you, sending you flying...

1422.content:
You saw yourself soaring high into the air, and hope to goodness that you land on something soft to break the fall. You close your eyes, and wait for what's in store for you, until... you landed on something really soft. You must be the luckiest man on Earth, you thought. You were sure you wouldn't make it if it went differently, but... something doesn't feel right. Or, in this case... smell right.

It smells absolutely horrendous where you are, and you could barely see from your eyes almost watering from said smell. But then, you looked at your surroundings, and noticed that the area is olive green... Just like the Medusa's skin! That isn't a crevice that you're stuck in... But the Medusa's ass!

Oh, yeah! You're the luckiest guy, all right, and all of it BAD. You tried to get out, but you're the landing has you lodged into her smelly, jiggly asscheeks, and you can't move. Then, you heard her speak to the Naga again.

"Lassst warning, Raya... you better get up now, or elsssse," she says with a little deviousness in her tone, but as if to respond to her friend, Raya let out another raunchy blast. 14432.content:
You slowly moved away from the huts, heading off into the wilderness slightly. A shudder reached you as you wandered past a few more huts, or houses, some girls swam around in a pond- it took you a moment to notice they were mermaids.
"P-perhaps there's someone my size further" You mutter, "Or- a door back to the mansion entrance..."

Tiredness slowly slid over you as you walked up to some kind of cave. Looking around, you notice that you're nowhere near another hut- you were lost in the wild and it was starting to rain. You rushed to get into the cave as soon as you saw how big the raindrops were.

Breathing heavily, you glanced back, seeing the rain turn into puddles that could of easily drowned you. You shuddered, stepping away from the rain.

THUD THUD

You winced, glancing either side of you with fear as two giant feet slammed down near you.

The girl was huge, amazon like compared to the other monsters you saw so far. She seemed strong, a toned body and worn down rags drapped around her to cover her body. She had some severe underbite, two tusks sticking out of her mouth, making her angry looking red eyes all the more scarier.

Her horns stuck out of her forhead. Her short brown hair dirty with some twigs still stuck in there. The girl grunted, obviously annoyed by the rain.

info.brief_description: You're stuck in a mansion filled with big butt BBWs and even bigger butted giantess!!!
info.description:
You're dared by a friend to spend a night camping deep in a supposedly haunted forest. Not one to turn down a dare, you set out deep into the woods with your tent. After spending more time than you hoped looking for a suitable camping spot, you suddenly realize you're lost! Circling for what seems like hours, you only get deeper into the forest, more and more trees that are taller and taller hemming in around you and blocking out all sunlight.

You're a breath's width from despair when you feel like you've just walked through an invisible curtain, and an absolutely enormous mansion materializes in front of you, covered from prying eyes under the canopy of the now humongous trees around you! The mansion seems to go on for forever in every direction, and you have to pinch yourself a few times to make sure you're not dreaming. Thinking you're saved, you make your way up to one of the many doors of the mansion, unfortunately you might be better off wondering the forest...

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Alright, this mansion you've found is actually a haven filled with big butt beauties from BBWs to giantess to giant mythical creatures like nagas and more! The mansion is separated for the most part into sections for each, and each section has a city's worth of stuff for it's citizens, from dorms, to malls, all the way to waterparks (so you can have yourself and whatever girl(s) you're with in just about any situation you can think of ^_^).

Unfortunately for you, you're already a really short and skinny guy to begin with, and all of the girls in the mansion are used to only having to look out for other girls their size (and even the BBWs are pretty darn big compared to you. That's sure to lead to all kinds of accidents, and that's assuming you can even get someone to notice you're there in the first place.

I'm wanting everything to kind of focus around the butts of these girls, and you being stuck under, around, and even in them, as well as everything that comes along with butts, including farting and toilet stuff. Try to keep yourself unnoticed as long as possible, I absolutely love the accidental/unaware torturing, especially when the girl would never be doing things like farting and such even around you if she knew you were there. ^____^

No underage characters, and no other guys in the story. Also, don't kill yourself off, for continuation purposes, you're invincible.

Anyway, hope everyone enjoys this, and happy reading!

(100 gift points for adding, a lot more than that if I especially like the chapter!)
